meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with long, narrow leaves.
meanings.sent1: The beargrasses in the garden have beautiful green leaves.
meanings.sent2: In the forest, beargrasses can be found among the trees.
meanings.sent3: The beargrasses decided to have a leaf party in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The beargrasses stood tall like soldiers guarding the garden.
meanings.sent5: The delicate beargrasses swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A type of grass-like plant native to North America.
meanings.sent1: Many animals find shelter under the beargrasses in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: Beargrasses are commonly seen in the fields across the country.
meanings.sent3: The beargrasses challenged the other plants to a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The beargrasses carpeted the ground like a green ocean.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant beargrasses added a touch of nature to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A plant used in traditional Native American basket weaving.
meanings.sent1: The intricate patterns of the basket were woven with beargrasses.
meanings.sent2: Native American artisans skillfully incorporate beargrasses into their crafts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous beargrasses played hide-and-seek in the basket weaver's studio.
meanings.sent4: The beargrasses intertwined like a story being told through the art of weaving.
meanings.sent5: The fragrant beargrasses brought a touch of tradition to the modern basket.
